items.sentence: When was the last time you saw your boyfriend?
Where were you on the evening of October 20th?
Where were you when I really needed your help?
Did you tell Tom he could go see Mary tonight?
Did you tell Tom why you want to go to Boston?
Did you understand what Tom was trying to say?
Tom was the only one who didn\'t say anything.
Tom was the only one who wasn\'t at the party.
I am not accustomed to walking long distances.
I\'m not as good at speaking French as Tom is.
I\'m not ever going to wear these shoes again.
The way Tom suggested we do that is dangerous.
The white ball weighs as much as the red ball.
I am tired of hearing the same thing so often.
I asked Tom if I could talk to him in private.
I asked for a seat in the non-smoking section.
I asked her to make four copies of the letter.
Tom broke Mary\'s expensive Chinese Ming vase.
Tom wanted the job, but they didn\'t hire him.
Tom wanted to go home early, but Mary didn\'t.
